title: Implement DVDInit()
description: Runtime implementatie van DVD initialisatie functie

title: Create simple test DOL
description: Minimal DOL that writes known bytes to RAM for testing ram_dump.py
close_reason: Created loop.dol test DOL that writes known pattern (DEADBEEF, CAFEBABE, 0x00-0x7F) to 0x80300000. Verified output via ram_dump.py.

title: Design DVDRead test case
description: Read SDK dvd.h. Define: which file to read, destination address, size, expected bytes.

title: Verify bin file output matches expected
description: End-to-end test: run DOL in Dolphin, dump RAM, verify bytes are correct
close_reason: Verified: Dumped RAM at 0x80300000 matches expected pattern. 64B DEADBEEF, 64B CAFEBABE, 128B sequential 0x00-0x7F. End-to-end test successful.

title: Build Dolphin RAM dump tool
description: Python script dat Dolphin draait en RAM dumpt naar bestand na een test DOL
close_reason: ram_dump.py tested and working. Added --run flag for continue→wait→halt workflow. Successfully dumped 256 bytes matching expected test pattern.

comments.author: chrisking1981
comments.text: Not tested yet - need to verify with actual Dolphin run

title: Implement DVDRead() sync
description: Synchrone file read van disc image naar RAM

title: Create RAM comparison tool
description: Tool om twee RAM dumps te vergelijken (expected vs actual), output diff

title: Find Nintendo SDK in Mario Party 4 decomp
description: Locate the dolphin/ directory with decompiled Nintendo SDK (GX, DVD, OS). Use as reference for implementing our runtime.
close_reason: Found SDK at decomp_mario_party_4/src/dolphin/. DVD has 28 functions in dvd.h

title: Design DVDInit test case
description: Read SDK dvd.h and dvd.c. Define: what RAM to check, what state to verify, what the test DOL should do.

title: Test Dolphin CLI launch with DOL
description: Verify we can start Dolphin via CLI with -b -d -e flags and a test DOL
close_reason: Verified: Dolphin starts with -d -e flags, GDB stub accessible on 9090, DOL boots successfully. Log shows 'Booting from executable' and nc confirmed port connection.

title: Create first real DVD unit test DOL
description: Use DVDInit/DVDRead from SDK. Load small file, dump RAM, verify bytes. This tests the actual DVD API, not just our test harness.

title: Create first DVD unit test DOL
description: Mini-DOL die alleen DVDInit + DVDRead doet voor test
close_reason: Duplicate van gamecube-b8w (Create first real DVD unit test DOL)

title: Review: Vergelijk huidige setup met ChatGPT plan
description: Lees docs/chatgpt-chats/idee-gesprek.md en vergelijk met huidige PROJECT_SPEC.md en tools. Maak gap analyse.
close_reason: Gap analyse compleet. Gaps: 1) ram_compare.py niet gebouwd, 2) Nintendo SDK niet geïntegreerd, 3) Echte DVD unit tests niet gemaakt. Tasks aangemaakt: gamecube-znz, gamecube-6c4, gamecube-b8w

title: Create Dolphin debug workflow skill
description: Create a skill/guide documenting how to use Dolphin GDB stub for testing. Include: 1) Starting Dolphin with -d flag, 2) Connect/continue/halt workflow, 3) Using ram_dump.py, 4) Example test cases
close_reason: Created .claude/skills/dolphin-debug/SKILL.md with complete workflow documentation: Dolphin startup, GDB connection, ram_dump.py usage, test patterns, troubleshooting.

title: Test GDB stub connection
description: Verify ram_dump.py can connect to Dolphin GDB stub and read memory
close_reason: GDB stub connection verified working. Connect→continue→halt→read workflow confirmed. Successfully read test pattern from RAM.

title: Implement tools/ram_compare.py
description: Create actual Python script based on ram-compare skill. Compare two binary files, show diff location, support volatile masking.
